titleStmt.title: The scotch lass deceiv'd by her bonny lad Jockey. To a new scoth [sic] tune of Mr. Farmers. This may be printed, R.P.
titleStmt.author: Farmer, Thomas, fl. 1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-Corner, near West-Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Whhen [sic] cold winter storms were past ..."
Publisher's name, place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Golden-Ball in Pye-Corner, near West-Smithfield.
